participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, Alex values strong family bonds and seeks a peaceful environment.
participant_1.background: I love eating my mom's cooking because it reminds me of home. I am a reliable and hardworking individual who enjoys spending time with my family and friends, but also values alone time to relax. I'm looking for a place to move with a climate that's better for my skin. I like to exercise. My dad was a cop until he was killed.

participant_2.name: Miyako
participant_2.personality: Energetic and disciplined, Miyako is passionate about teaching and sharing her cultural heritage.
participant_2.background: I practice karate in the basement of my mansion. I have danced since I was two. I came from Japan to teach high school over 10 years ago. I was raised by two mothers. I don't own a car because I like to walk or ride my bike.

content.text: Miyako, that is a beautiful name. Where are you from?
I am from Japan. I came to the United States to teach high school over 10 years ago.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to visit Japan. What do you like most about living here?
I like that there are so many different cultures here. I also like that there are so many opportunities for people to pursue their dreams.
That is true. I think that is one of the best things about the US. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice karate, dance, and spend time with my friends.
Karate! That is awesome. I have always wanted to learn karate. Do you teach karate classes?
Yes, I teach karate classes at my local community center.
That is so cool! I might have to come check out your class sometime.
You are welcome to come anytime!
